message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $120. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $90 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter your offer with $100 for the product. This is my final offer.
